sentences.en: But he was also hungry , with a gnawing , unwholesome kind of hunger.
sentences.cn: 他也感到饥肠辘辘, 饿得难受.

sentences.en: Chueh - hui felt as if something were gnawing at his heart.
sentences.cn: 他觉得什么东西在咬他的心.

sentences.en: Doubts were already gnawing away at the back of his mind.
sentences.cn: 心底的疑团已经开始困扰他。

sentences.en: He was afflicted always with a gnawing restlessness.
sentences.cn: 他老是被一种叫人苦恼的不安情绪折磨着.

sentences.en: He was gnawing his finger - nails with impatience.
sentences.cn: 他焦灼地咬着他的指甲.

sentences.en: It was no worse, she said, on his birthday or the anniversary of his death – it was a constant, daily, gnawing sense of loss.
sentences.cn: 她说，在他的生日或者忌日并不会更难过，这种痛苦是持续的，每天你都感觉到失去他的刻骨的痛。

sentences.en: Mary Ann's exhilaration gave way to gnawing fear.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·安从欣喜若狂变得忧惧不安。

sentences.en: Natalie stood beside him, gnawing her lips.
sentences.cn: 娜塔丽站在他身旁, 咬着嘴唇.

sentences.en: Rabbits still manage to find a way in. I am sure that some have even taken to gnawing through the metal.
sentences.cn: 兔子还是找到办法进去了。我敢断定，有些兔子甚至已经用上了咬断金属的办法。

sentences.en: Scarlett sponged her face in silence but fear was gnawing at her.
sentences.cn: 思嘉悄悄用海绵给她揩脸,但心里十分害怕.

sentences.en: She could do nothing but view him with gnawing contempt.
sentences.cn: 除了痛苦地鄙视他之外,她对他毫无办法.

sentences.en: The dog was gnawing a bone.
The dog was gnawing a bone.
The farmer's dog has been gnawing away on a bone under the table.
sentences.cn: 那农夫的狗一直在桌子底下啃骨头.

sentences.en: There was a gnawing pain from the wound.
Tu Wei - yueh was frowning unhappily and gnawing his lips.
sentences.cn: 屠维岳 皱着眉头咬嘴唇.

trans.tran_en: worrying or painful, especially for a long time

trans.tran_cn: 咬, 苛责, 不断的苦痛
咬( gnaw的现在分词 )，（长时间） 折磨某人，（使）苦恼，（长时间）危害某事物
